name: Dino Dungeon (Demo)
description:
DINO DUNGEON (Demo)

You and your Dino buddies must work together if you are to find your way home! Switch between Dinos in this 2D physics puzzle platformer. Run, Jump and Kick your way through the dungeons, stepping on each other to freedom!

NOTE: This demo has 10 levels that will likely be completely removed and remade in the final product. It is simply a proof of concept.

Features
  • Unlockable Dinos!
  • Simple compelling gameplay
  • Original soundtrack
  • Full controller support
  • Pixel art aesthetic
  • 2D Physics!
  • Play with one hand
How To Play Action Primary Secondary Move A + D 🡄 + 🡆 Jump J SPACE Kick K E Loop through Dinos L - Go to Dino 1, 2, 3, 4 - Credits
  • Neelesh Dooraree - Game Design
  • Fred Bux - Music
  • Arks - Character Design
  • Jehal - Environment Art
Donations

All donations for this demo will go towards bailing out arrested protesters. These protests were triggered by the murder of George Floyd in a recent act of police brutality. If you do no wish to support this, you can still download the demo for free.
